pages.text: An $(l:bigreactors:reactor/active)actively cooled$(/l) Reactor / Turbine setup vaporizes a coolant using the heat of the Reactor to generate a vapor that can be used to drive the rotors of many Turbines and generate energy.$(br2)A $(bold)coolant$() is a fluid that, if recognised, can be pumped into the Coolant Fluid Tank of the Reactor using a $(l:bigreactors:reactor/part-forgefluidport)Fluid Port$(/l) in input mode.

A $(bold)vapor$() is a fluid that is the result of a coolant being vaporized inside a Reactor, and that can be pumped from a Reactor to a Turbine (using $(l:bigreactors:reactor/part-forgefluidport)Fluid Port$(/l)) to be used to drive the Turbine rotor and then be condensed back to the original coolant to let the cycle start again.$(br2)Only valid coolants and vapors can be used inside a Reactor or a Turbine.
Extreme Reactors register, by default, water as a valid coolant and steam as it resulting vapor.$(br2)Other mods or mod packs can add their own fluids or modify/remove the default ones.
